T04D3914:19a-0: @19a tshad med bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa bzhugs /
T04D3914:19a-2: * // byams pa dang ni snying rje dang //
T04D3914:19a-3: dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms te //
T04D3914:19a-4: de dag chen po tshad med pa //
T04D3914:19a-6: 'di ltar sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa dang /
T04D3914:19a-10: de la sems can tshad med pa ni khams gsum
T04D3914:19a-11: pa'i sems can mang nyung 'di tsam zhig yod do
T04D3914:19a-12: zhes dpag par mi nus pas na sems can tshad
T04D3914:19a-14: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa de bzhin
T04D3914:19a-15: gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa'i mdo las
T04D3914:19b-0: 'di skad du / rigs kyi @19b bu phyogs 'di
T04D3914:19b-1: nyid na shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi bug pa
T04D3914:19b-2: na gnas par gyur pa'i sems can gang dag de
T04D3914:19b-3: bzhin gshegs pas gzigs par gyur pa de dag ni
T04D3914:19b-4: ches mang gi / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
T04D3914:19b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi rnams ni
T04D3914:19b-7: de ltar snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams ni tshad med do zhes gsungs te /
T04D3914:19b-8: de lta bas na sems can gyi khams tshad med
T04D3914:19b-9: pa gzung bar mi nus pas na sems can tshad
T04D3914:19b-11: tshad med pa bsgoms pas sems can tshad med pa
T04D3914:19b-12: la ci ltar dmigs par bya zhing bsgom zhe na
T04D3914:19b-13: / 'di ltar khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad thog ma med pa'i dus nas /
T04D3914:19b-14: so so'i las kyi dbang gis gnas mthon dman du
T04D3914:19b-15: 'khor ba 'di dag bdag dang lan brgya stong du
T04D3914:19b-16: mar gnyen du ma gyur pa med de /
T04D3914:19b-17: 'di ni bdag gi gnyen yin no snyam nas /
T04D3914:19b-18: sems can thams cad la tshad med pa bzhi pos
T04D3914:19b-19: btang snyoms su gnas pa 'di ni sems can tshad
T04D3914:19b-20: med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T04D3914:19b-21: go // de la tshogs tshad med pa ni /
T04D3914:19b-22: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa ste /
T04D3914:19b-23: rgyur gyur pa ni chos bzhi po yin la de
T04D3914:19b-24: ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med
T04D3914:19b-25: pa rnam pa gnyis bskyed pa'i rgyu'am ngo bo yin
T04D3914:19b-26: te / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo dag las gsungs pa /
T04D3914:19b-27: rigs kyi bu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa
T04D3914:19b-28: stan las ma langs pa la yon 'bul bar byed
T04D3914:19b-29: pa ni bsod nams dpag tu med pa bskyed par
T04D3914:19b-30: 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T04D3914:19b-31: 'di ltar byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa
T04D3914:19b-32: bsgom pa'i mi la yon phul bas kyang bsod nams
T04D3914:19b-33: mang po 'thob na gang tshad med pa rnams su
T04D3914:19b-34: dngos su nyams su blangs te bsgoms pa lta smos
T04D3914:19b-36: bsod nams kyi phung po gong ma bas ches mang du bskyed do //
T04D3914:19b-37: de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa skyes pa dang /
T04D3914:19b-38: rgyu de las chos kyi tshogs tshad med pa bskyed la /
T04D3914:19b-39: rgyu de las ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bskyed pa'o //
T04D3914:19b-40: chos tshad med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i
T04D3914:19b-41: yon tan stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa
T04D3914:20a-1: rgyur 'gyur ba ni chos bzhi po la gnas pa'i
T04D3914:20a-2: sgo nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs skyes
T04D3914:20a-3: pa'i rgyus sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams
T04D3914:20a-4: skye zhing 'grub par 'gyur bas na tshad med pa
T04D3914:20a-5: bzhi la nan tan du bya'o //
T04D3914:20a-6: chos bzhi po de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
T04D3914:20a-7: shes tshad med pa'i dmigs pa'i yul du gyur pa'am
T04D3914:20a-8: / ye shes nyid byams pa la sogs pa chos
T04D3914:20a-9: bzhi po de dag gi ngang du'am ngo bor gnas
T04D3914:20a-10: / te / shes bya dang shes pa tha mi dad pa'i spyod yul du'am /
T04D3914:20a-11: ngo bor gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T04D3914:20a-12: de la byams pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa
T04D3914:20a-13: ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi po snang ba
T04D3914:20a-14: thob pa dang snang ba mched pa dang /
T04D3914:20a-15: de kho na nyid kyi don la phyogs gcig pa rjes su zhugs pa dang /
T04D3914:20a-16: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba
T04D3914:20a-17: nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi la gnas pa'i byang
T04D3914:20a-19: 'di ltar nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi la gnas
T04D3914:20a-20: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa'i dbang
T04D3914:20a-21: po'i spyod yul du ni lha dang mi dang yi
T04D3914:20a-22: dags la sogs pa dang sems can dmyal ba'i gnas
T04D3914:20a-23: rnams mngon sum du gyur te /
T04D3914:20a-24: lha dang mi la sogs pa dang ngan song gi
T04D3914:20a-25: gnas de dag na sdug bsngal ba'i rang bzhin can
T04D3914:20a-26: gyi sems can rnams mthong nas lhag par snying rje
T04D3914:20a-27: chen po skye zhing sems can de dag thog ma
T04D3914:20a-28: med pa nas 'khor bar 'khor ba na /
T04D3914:20a-29: bdag gi gnyen du ma gyur pa med par khong
T04D3914:20a-30: du chud nas sems can de dag thams cad la
T04D3914:20a-31: bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sems pa'i byams pa
T04D3914:20a-32: chen po'i sems skyes pa'i sgo nas sems can thams
T04D3914:20a-33: cad sdug bsngal las thar te bde ba la gnas
T04D3914:20a-34: par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs shing /
T04D3914:20a-35: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa
T04D3914:20a-36: ni sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa zhes bya
T04D3914:20a-38: byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po brnyes pa nas
T04D3914:20a-39: bdun pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
T04D3914:20a-40: chos kyi de kho na nyid mngon sum du rtogs
T04D3914:20a-41: pa'i sgo nas sems can la byams pa skye ste
T04D3914:20a-42: / de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin nyid med pa yin na /
T04D3914:20a-43: sems can rnams kyis de ltar ma shes te dngos
T04D3914:20b-0: po la mngon par zhen pas khams gsum @20b du
T04D3914:20b-1: 'khor bar gyur pa re sdug pa de dag la
T04D3914:20b-2: byams pa'i sems skye zhing 'di dag gis chos nyid
T04D3914:20b-3: rtogs par shog cig ces smon lam 'debs shing /
T04D3914:20b-4: sems can thams cad la chos kyis phan 'dogs par
T04D3914:20b-5: byed pa ni chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa zhes
T04D3914:20b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa brnyes pa yan
T04D3914:20b-8: chad nas sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa man chad ni
T04D3914:20b-9: lhun gyis grub pa'i sa dmigs pa med pa zhes
T04D3914:20b-10: bya ba ste / sa brgyad pa yan chad na
T04D3914:20b-11: rtog pa med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis
T04D3914:20b-12: sems can la byams pa skye zhing phan 'dogs par
T04D3914:20b-13: bya ba ste / mdzad de / dper na yid
T04D3914:20b-14: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang dpag bsam
T04D3914:20b-15: gyi shing bzhin du sems can la phan 'dogs te
T04D3914:20b-16: bya ba ste / mdzad de / / de yang
T04D3914:20b-17: rtog pa mi mnga' bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam
T04D3914:20b-18: gyi dbang gis sems can la byams pa chen po
T04D3914:20b-19: yang lhun gyis grub par 'byung zhing sems can gyi
T04D3914:20b-20: don mdzad pa de ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams
T04D3914:20b-21: pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T04D3914:20b-22: 'o na so so'i skye bo las dang po pas
T04D3914:20b-23: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ji ltar bsgom
T04D3914:20b-24: zhe na / 'di ltar so so'i skye bo las
T04D3914:20b-25: dang po pas sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'i
T04D3914:20b-27: sems can snying du sdug pa dang /
T04D3914:20b-29: snying du mi sdug pa yin pa'i rnam pa 'di gsum yod pa las /
T04D3914:20b-30: sems can snying du sdug pa la yang gsum du dbye ste /
T04D3914:20b-32: sems can tha mal pa dang /
T04D3914:20b-33: mi sdug pa la yang gsum du dbye ste /
T04D3914:20b-35: bdun du dbye ba byas la /
T04D3914:20b-36: thog mar 'bring tsam du sdug pa de pha ma la sogs par rab tu bsgom mo /
T04D3914:20b-37: de goms pa dang tha mal pa kun rab dang 'dra bar bsgom /
T04D3914:20b-38: de nas cung zad mi sdug ba sdug pa rab dang 'dra bar bsgom /
T04D3914:20b-39: de goms pa dang mi sdug pa 'bring sdug pa rab dang 'dra bar bsgom /
T04D3914:20b-40: de nas shin tu mi sdug pa la yang pha ma dang 'dra bar bya ste /
T04D3914:20b-41: de ltar goms pa'i dmigs pa yang sems can thams
T04D3914:20b-42: cad thog ma med pa'i dus nas pha ma la
T04D3914:20b-43: sogs pa gnyen du ma gyur pa med pa dang
T04D3914:20b-44: / de ltar bsgom pa yang thog mar yang khyim
T04D3914:20b-45: gang gi mi tsam la bsgoms pa nas rim gyis
T04D3914:21a-0: / te / de nas ni mtha' yas par @21a * //
T04D3914:21a-1: bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don bstan to //
T04D3914:21a-2: de la snying rje ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can
T04D3914:21a-3: la dmigs pa'i snying rje ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug
T04D3914:21a-5: skye pa la sogs pa brgyad kyis sdug bsngal ba'i
T04D3914:21a-6: sems can de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal snying rjes
T04D3914:21a-7: sel zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T04D3914:21a-8: nyes pa byed pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i snying
T04D3914:21a-9: rje ni gong gi sdug bsngal de dag gi rtsa
T04D3914:21a-10: ba'am / rgyu mi dge ba la spyod pa'i sems
T04D3914:21a-11: can de dag gi mi dge ba kun snying rjes
T04D3914:21a-12: sel zhes bya ba'i don to //
T04D3914:21a-13: rkyen dang mi ldan pas rnam par ma grol ba'i
T04D3914:21a-14: sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje ni sems can
T04D3914:21a-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi ldan pas chos ma
T04D3914:21a-16: thos pa ste / de yang rgyud las /
T04D3914:21a-17: dge bshes ma bsten chos ma mnyan bya ba dang /
T04D3914:21a-18: ma grol ba'i sems can la snying rjes grol bar byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T04D3914:21a-19: de la dga' ba ni de la sems can dag zang zing gi 'byor ba dang /
T04D3914:21a-21: bde ba'i 'byor ba dang ldan pas dga' ba'o //
T04D3914:21a-22: bdag gi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa la dmigs pa'i
T04D3914:21a-23: dga' ba ni bdag nyid dge ba'i tshogs che ba
T04D3914:21a-24: la dmigs nas dga' ba'i don to //
T04D3914:21a-25: dam pa'i chos kyi ro la dmigs pa'i dga' ba ni bdag dang gzhan chos thos pa'i ro dang /
T04D3914:21a-26: bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i ro rnyed pa'i sgo nas dga' ba'i don to //
T04D3914:21a-27: de la btang snyoms ni sems can gyi don la
T04D3914:21a-28: spyod pa dag ni skal ba yod pa dang skal
T04D3914:21a-29: ba med pa'i btang snyoms ni /
T04D3914:21a-30: skal ba dang ldan pa'i don ni bya /
T04D3914:21a-31: skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i don ni mi bya
T04D3914:21a-32: zhes de ltar 'byed pa med par gnyis ka'i don
T04D3914:21a-33: snyoms par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T04D3914:21a-34: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang ma
T04D3914:21a-35: rnyed pa la sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa 'di lta
T04D3914:21a-41: ma grags pa la dga' ba dang mi dga' ba med par btang snyoms su gnas pa ste /
T04D3914:21a-42: de la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad ni rnyed pa
T04D3914:21a-43: dang ma rnyed pa la sogs pa la bya ste
T04D3914:21a-44: / chos brgyad po de dag 'jig rten na grags
T04D3914:21a-45: shing yod pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad do
T04D3914:21a-46: / // chos brgyad po de dag la ji ltar btang snyoms su gnas she na /
T04D3914:21b-0: 'di @21b ltar bdag gis longs spyod phun sum tshogs
T04D3914:21b-1: pa rnyed pa na de la dga' ba ste chags
T04D3914:21b-3: longs spyod 'gribs sam ma rnyed na yang de yi
T04D3914:21b-4: chad pa med cing mi dga' ba med pa ni
T04D3914:21b-5: rnyed ma rnyed la dga' mi dga' med pa'i btang
T04D3914:21b-6: snyoms zhes bya'o // bdag gi mdza' bo byams pa
T04D3914:21b-7: zhig gis bdag gi lus la spos dang tsandan la
T04D3914:21b-8: sogs pa'i byug pas nyug cing bsnyen bkur dang bsti
T04D3914:21b-9: stang byed na bkur sti'i bde ba la dga' zhing
T04D3914:21b-11: dgra bo zhig gis bdag gi lus la brdeg brdung
T04D3914:21b-12: la sogs pa byed na yang de la'ang mi khro
T04D3914:21b-13: zhing brdeg brdung gi sdug bsngal dang du blang ba
T04D3914:21b-14: dang / sdug go mi snyam ste /
T04D3914:21b-15: bde sdug la dga' mi dga' med pa'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o //
T04D3914:21b-16: bdag gi mdza' bo zhig gis bdag gi rigs las
T04D3914:21b-17: glengs te snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod na de la
T04D3914:21b-18: dga' zhing gzengs mtho bar 'gyur ba yang med la
T04D3914:21b-19: / dgra bo zhig gis bdag gi skyon brus shing
T04D3914:21b-20: bsgrags na yang de la yang mi dga' zhing dpa'
T04D3914:21b-21: zhum pa med pa ni bstod pa dang smad pa
T04D3914:21b-23: mi dga' ba med pa'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o //
T04D3914:21b-24: bdag gi yon tan yod pa skye bo mang pos
T04D3914:21b-25: thos shing shes par gyur pa na 'di snyam du
T04D3914:21b-26: bdag ni yon tan can du skye bo mang pos
T04D3914:21b-27: shes pas bdag gi yon tan grags te ma subs
T04D3914:21b-28: so zhes yon tan grags pa la dga' ba yang
T04D3914:21b-29: med la / bdag gi yon tan skye bo mang
T04D3914:21b-30: pos ma thos shing ma shes na yang bdag gi
T04D3914:21b-32: nub bo zhes mi dga' ba med pa ni yon
T04D3914:21b-33: tan grags pa dang ma grags pa la dga' ba
T04D3914:21b-34: dang mi dga' ba med pa'i btang snyoms zhes bya
T04D3914:21b-35: ba'i don to // tshogs zhes bya ba ni gong gi tshig ste /
T04D3914:21b-36: tshogs yongs su bskang ba la dus dang dus ma
T04D3914:21b-37: yin pa la dmigs pa'i btang snyoms ni bdag nyid
T04D3914:21b-38: dge ba'i tshogs bskang zhing spyad pa la dus 'dir
T04D3914:21b-39: ni bya / dus 'dir ni mi bya zhes 'byed
T04D3914:21b-40: pa med par dus kun tu spyod par byed pa'o
T04D3914:21b-41: ni bya / // tshad med bzhi po dag ni tshangs pa'i gnas //
T04D3914:21b-42: bsgom pa kun gyi don du bdag gis 'di //
T04D3914:21b-43: sems can don du byas shing bsdebs pa des //
T04D3914:21b-44: 'gro kun sgrib bral myur du sangs rgyas shog /
T04D3914:21b-45: tshad med pa bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon
